info.name: Chat Message
info.description:
## üìò Chat API Documentation

Base URL: `https://yourdomain.com/api`

---

### 1\. üì§ Send Message

**Endpoint:** `POST /chat/send`  
**Description:** Send a message from one user to another. Supports text, attachments, and entity linkage (e.g. task or project).

#### üî∏ Request Body (JSON)

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "sender_id": 1,
  "receiver_id": 2,
  "message_text": "Hello",
  "message_type": "text",
  "attachment_url": null,
  "entity_type": "project",
  "entity_id": 10
}

 ```

#### üî∏ Fields

| Field | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| sender_id | integer | Yes | ID of the sender |
| receiver_id | integer | Yes | ID of the receiver |
| message_text | string | No | Text content of the message |
| message_type | string | Yes | Type of message (`text`, `image`, `file`, etc.) |
| attachment_url | string | No | URL of the attachment (if any) |
| entity_type | string | No | Related entity type (`task`, `project`, etc.) |
| entity_id | integer | No | Related entity ID |

#### ‚úÖ Success Response

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Message sent successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "sender_id": 1,
    "receiver_id": 2,
    "message_text": "Hello",
    "message_type": "text",
    "attachment_url": null,
    "entity_type": "project",
    "entity_id": 10,
    "created_at": "2025-04-30T10:00:00Z"
  }
}

 ```

---

### 2\. üìú Get Chat History

**Endpoint:** `GET /chat/history/{sender_id}`  
**Description:** Retrieve the conversation history between the authenticated user and another user (identified by sender_id).

#### üî∏ Path Parameter

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sender_id | integer | ID of the other user |

#### ‚úÖ Success Response

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "sender_id": 1,
      "receiver_id": 2,
      "message_text": "Hello",
      "message_type": "text",
      "attachment_url": null,
      "entity_type": "project",
      "entity_id": 10,
      "created_at": "2025-04-30T10:00:00Z"
    }
  ]
}

 ```

---

### 3\. üßë‚Äçü§ù‚Äçüßë Get Chat Users

**Endpoint:** `GET /chat/users`  
**Description:** Get a list of users that the authenticated user has chatted with.

#### ‚úÖ Success Response

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "Ahmed",
      "email": "ahmed@example.com"
    }
  ]
}

 ```

---

### 4\. üõë Delete Chat

**Endpoint:** `DELETE /chat/delete/{id}`  
**Description:** Delete a specific chat message by its ID.

#### üî∏ Path Parameter

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | integer | ID of the message |

#### ‚úÖ Success Response

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Message deleted successfully"
}

 ```

---

## üîê Authentication

All routes require authentication via Bearer token.

**Header:**

```
makefileCopyEditAuthorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN

 ```

exec: pm.test("Response time is less than 200ms", function () {
pm.test("Response has the required fields", function () {
pm.test("Sender_id, receiver_id, and message_id are non-negative integers", function () {
pm.expect(responseData.data.sender_id).to.be.a('number').and.to.satisfy((val) => val >= 0, "Sender_id should be a non-negative integer");
pm.expect(responseData.data.receiver_id).to.be.a('number').and.to.satisfy((val) => val >= 0, "Receiver_id should be a non-negative integer");
pm.expect(responseData.data.message_id).to.be.a('number').and.to.satisfy((val) => val >= 0, "Message_id should be a non-negative integer");

{

  "attachment_url": "https://laravel.com/docs/12.x/installation",
  "message_type": "text",
  "entity_type": "project",
  "entity_id": 1
}

request.description:
### POST /chat/send

This endpoint is used to send a message in a chat conversation.

#### Request Body

- `sender_id` (integer) - The ID of the sender.
    
- `receiver_id` (integer) - The ID of the receiver.
    
- `message_text` (string) - The text of the message.
    
- `attachment_url` (string) - The URL of any attachment included in the message.
    
- `message_type` (string) - The type of message (e.g., text, image, file).
    
- `entity_type` (string) - The type of entity related to the message.
    
- `entity_id` (integer) - The ID of the entity related to the message.
    

#### Response

``` json
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "status": { "type": "string" },
    "message": { "type": "string" },
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "sender_id": { "type": "integer" },
        "receiver_id": { "type": "integer" },
        "message_text": { "type": "string" },
        "message_type": { "type": "string" },
        "attachment_url": { "type": "string" },
        "updated_at": { "type": "string" },
        "created_at": { "type": "string" },
        "message_id": { "type": "integer" }
      }
    }
  }
}

 ```

pm.expect(responseData.data.receiver_id).to.be.a('number').and.to.satisfy((val) => val >= 0, "Receiver_id should be a non-negative integer");
pm.expect(responseData.data.message_id).to.be.a('number').and.to.satisfy((val) => val >= 0, "Message_id should be a non-negative integer");
